backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the backend canister with types for medical reports and simplified summaries, and three public functions: submitReport (stores a new report), getSummary (retrieves a summary by ID), and getHistory (returns all reports in reverse-chronological order).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (mobile-first UI, input screen, results screen with i18n, history screen) to their source files, component dependencies, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence descriptions of each frontend source file, serving as a reference summary for the MediClear app's frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, card, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the MediClear PWA with mobile-optimized viewport, theme color, Apple web app meta tags, and a root div mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with four routes (splash /, input, results/:reportId, history) and exports the RouterProvider-wrapped App component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Sticky app header component with the MediClear logo, optional dynamic title, and conditional back/history/new navigation buttons styled with a gradient.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper that composes AppHeader with a flexible main content area, applying consistent mobile padding and max-width container to all screens.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using TanStack Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) configurations, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useLanguage.ts: Custom hook that manages the app's selected language, persisting the choice to localStorage and returning the corresponding translation object.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching report history, fetching a single summary, and submitting a new report via the backend actor.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the Translations interface and a full translations record for six languages (en, hi, es, fr, ar, bn) covering all UI strings in the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines CSS custom properties for a medical teal-green color palette (light and dark), and declares animation keyframes and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/medicalSimplifier.ts: Contains a comprehensive medical glossary mapping clinical jargon to plain-language equivalents, used to simplify medical reports and lab values for patients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryScreen.tsx: Page component that displays a sorted list of past medical reports fetched via useGetHistory, with loading skeletons, error handling, and navigation to individual report views.
frontend/src/pages/InputScreen.tsx: Input page where users paste a lab report and/or prescription into two separate text areas, then submit to trigger client-side simplification and navigate to the results screen.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsScreen.tsx: Results page that fetches and displays a simplified medical summary (key findings, medications, action steps) with a language selector for multilingual rendering and a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/pages/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen shown on app launch that displays the MediClear logo and branding, then auto-navigates to the input screen after ~2.8 seconds.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining the design system: custom OKLCH-based color tokens, extended border radii, font families (Inter/Nunito), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing the MediClear app's purpose, architecture notes, implemented features, and image asset requirements for the logo and splash screen background.
